alert.note: Alert for Sumner (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 4:47PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Sumner County through 515 PM CDT... At 446 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near South Haven, or 10 miles south of Wellington, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Belle Plaine, Oxford, South Haven, Geuda Springs, Mayfield, Hunnewell, Riverdale, Perth and Wellington Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 1 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
